en: [For them are] gardens of perpetual residence which they will enter.

ar: يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ
en: They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold
[For them are] gardens of perpetual residence which they will enter.

ar: يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ
en: They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold
and their garments therein will be silk.
And they will say, "Praise to Allah,
And they will say, "Praise to Allah,
who has removed from us [all] sorrow.
Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative -
He who has settled us in the home of duration [i.e., Paradise]
There touches us not in it any fatigue,
There touches us not in it any fatigue,
and there touches us not in it weariness [of mind]."
